name: BOYD - Little Strawberry Adventure
description:
Game submitted for the Bring Out Your Dead jam.

An old 2D Zelda-like dungeon that I started as an assignment in my first year at ENJMIN (December 2012).

We had to develop a short game using GameMaker with some constraints that I can't remember. I wanted to do something cute and detailed in pixel art but I didn't finish in time and never got to complete it later. There are still many Game Maker default props. Like the little strawberry instead of a proper player character which gave its name to the game. :'D
